articles.description: Looking for a great book (or 10) to tear into this summer? We’ve got you covered with the best books for your summer reading list, no matter what kind of summer reader you are.
articles.content: If you buy something from a Polygon link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics statement.The first day of summer might not be until June 21, but warmer weather and longer days mean you can… [+10124 chars]

articles.description: At the request of Lita, Goldberg agrees to help the former WWE Women’s Champion search for the jacket that he was wearing when he Speared The Rock during his...
